Description.Text: Facilities Travellers can enjoy a pleasant stay in one of the 70 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a bar, a babysitting service, a childcare service and a transfer service. Wireless internet access is available to guests in the public areas. Rooms Rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. A double bed ensures a good night's sleep. A safe and a minibar are also available. Guests will also find a mini fridge included as standard. Internet access, a TV and WiFi add to the comfort of the holiday. Sports/Entertainment An entertainment programme is offered for children. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable. It is also possible to order breakfast.
